data.title: Best Movies Like Hidalgo
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Hidalgo: Bite the Bullet (1975), Lawrence of Arabia (1962), Seabiscuit (2003), Secretariat (2010), In the Heart of the Sea (2015), Young Guns (1988), Dances with Wolves (1990), Young Guns II (1990), Mackenna's Gold (1969), The Lone Ranger (2013)
